page.title: 10CLUBS NEWT'N LINFORD CRICKET
page.content: My dad plays for Newtown Linford Cricket Club on a Saturday.On Sunday he plays for Beacon Cricket Club.On Saturday he goes to the cricket ground at 1.30.They get changed and go out for a practice.Yesterday it was a night match.It started at 6.00.The away team went into bat first and they scored 116 in 18 overs.It was our turn to bat.They got a few out ,then it was my dads turn to bat.He got 37 not out in the end.Newtown got 106 in 18 overs.My dad really enjoys playing cricket.I score for my dads team on Sunday.
